description.short: The Tower Hotel offers stunning views of the River Thames, The Shard skyscraper, and Tower Bridge. With modern decor, world-class comforts, and delicious fusion cuisine, it's the perfect base for two travelers exploring the area. Stay in a comfortable hotel in Tower Hamlets, London with essential amenities and complimentary wireless internet. Within walking distance, explore famous landmarks such as the Tower of London, The View from The Shard, and Sky Garden. Enjoy a delicious breakfast, relax at the elegant bar, savor delightful dishes at the restaurant, and embark on exciting tours. Choose from rooms with stunning city skyline or tranquil river views, perfect for two travelers. [Some content may be Generative AI assisted. Inaccuracies may occur.]

featureGroups.name: Take a look at these facilities:
Things to do, ways to relax

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: We stayed at the hotel for about 5 nights. The location is great, right at the river Thames, and close to the inner city. We liked the hotel, except that the lines were very long in the morning for breakfast and overall there was not enough space in the breakfast and dining areas. Also, in 2 nights there were fire alarms that were false. And the sliding doors in the corridors make a lot of noise at night. The waitresses in the bar did not speak enough English.
comments.reviewNegatives: Breakfast and dining areas are too small, long lines in the morning
comments.reviewPositives: Very nice rooms, spacious and good breakfast

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: The Tower Hotel is a very large and popular hotel in a great location on the Thames right beside the beautiful Tower Bridge, Tower of London and St Catharines Docks. There are a host of nice eateries and pubs close by and the Tower Hill station on the City Circle Line is only about 5 mins walk away.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: Have stayed at this hotel on numerous occasions when staying in London, have occasionally stayed at one or two others but have always come back to the Tower.  The staff are helpful and courteous.  When we have checked in we request if possible a view of the bridge and the receptionists' have always tried to oblige and 9 times out of 10 have.  The one occasion they couldn't they gave us an equally fantastic view of St Katherine's Dock.  The most recent visit was to celebrate my partner's birthday and on explaining this on checking in, we were given an upgrade and a bottle of wine was placed in the room. My only one complaint, if you can call it a complaint is that at the buffet breakfast it can be a little slow in obtaining your tea or coffee from the waiters.
comments.reviewNegatives: No ice-making machines on every floor.
comments.reviewPositives: Location, fantastic views, extremely friendly and helpful staff, clean, spacious comfortable rooms.

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: We go to this hotel a lot it's ideal to visiting London markets like brick lane, porta bella road, spitafields and many more easy access to city center by bus or train you can even get the Thames water bus to the o2 and many more places . I would recomend this hotel to any one.
comments.reviewNegatives: Some of the decor needs refreshing
comments.reviewPositives: Close to tower bridge and all London has to offer

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: Staff are ultra professional and will bend over backwards to assist in any way possible. Hotel is elegant and some rooms have a magnificent view of Tower Bridge and the Thames. The location is right next to Tower Bridge and St Katherine's Dock where there are great restaurants and many tourist attractions.
comments.reviewPositives: view of Tower Bridge and professional and helpful staff

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: we had stayed at this hotel a couple of years ago and had no problems so thought we would try it again. it did not let us down the room was great overlooking the quay at the rear of the hotel. the room 404 was a good size for the price we paid we were very happy with what we got.
comments.reviewTitle: Perfect hotel for a weekend away

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments:
The room are confortable and good size and the staff are friendly. This hotel need a business centre and good computers with internet acess for room guest.
The view of London Tower Bridge was very beautiful especially at night.
The room rate is reasonable and the only diadvantage of this hotel is far from shopping area and eating places.
Taxi service always avialable in the hotel area so transportation is not a problem.
comments.reviewPositives: Good for tourist and nice view of London Tower Bridge
comments.reviewTitle: Wonderful Tower Bridge View & Friendly Staff

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: The location is right on the bank of Thames river. Easy access to the underground and close to business area. The room is clean and big (comparing to hotels around Oxford Street). One bad thing is I have been put in the room near the door and heard the door bang all night when the quests were in and out. The should not give this kind of room to any guest. Terrible!

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments:
The hotel staff where frendly and helpfull, the location is great for trains and buses to stratford shopping certre, and to the west end.it is close to Katherines dock which is walking distance to good resturants and bars.The standerd rooms
are a bit dated, but the rest of the hotel is lovely, and the breakfast was exellent.
comments.reviewPositives: Hotel is within ease reach of tubes and bus routs to city center and shoping centers

comments.formattedReviewHelpfulText: Did you find this review helpful?
comments.reviewComments: booked here for a weekend to treat my girlfriend, booked through trivago at an excellent price. on arrival we were taken to a separate que to check in to help get the que down. once at the smaller reception the computer used to check in crashed which meant we had to wait a few minutes which was no trouble at all, however due to this we were given a fee upgrade to a superior room which was a very welcomed bonus. the staff in the hotel were all very polite, helpful and well mannered, the hotel has fabulous views and links to city centre. on the whole a fabulous hotel and can't wait to go back in june, thank you
comments.reviewTitle: Excellent location excellent staff excellent food

aboutHotel.legalInformationDescription: This property is managed by a private host.</br></br>EU law relating to professional hosts may not apply here.</br></br>Hosts who have registered with Agoda as a private host are parties that rent out their property or properties for purposes which are outside their trade, business, or profession. They are not officially traders (like a global chain) and therefore may not fall under the same consumer protection rules under EU law, but don't worry. Agoda provides you with the same customer service as we do with any stay. This doesn't mean that your stay or experience will be any different than booking with a professional host.
aboutHotel.nswCodeOfConductDescription: The New South Wales Government has issued a mandatory {0} applying to short-term rental accommodations (STRAs). roomRateCategoryOverlay.childPolicyListingDisclaimer: Due to the limited number of listings, we may get no search results when using some child categories. In such cases, the superior child category or the adult fare will be used when calculating your price.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.stayLengthRule1: When cancelling only part of a multi-night reservation, a cancellation fee will apply for one night, calculated as indicated above based on the first night of the reservation.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.stayLengthRule2: When cancelling only part of a multi-night reservation, cancellation fees will apply for each cancelled night individually, calculated as indicated above.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.stayLengthRule3: When cancelling only part of a multi-night reservation, no cancellation fees will apply.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.stayLengthRule4: Please contact Customer Support to inquire about cancellation fees when cancelling only part of a multi-night reservation.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.guestSizeRule1: When cancelling only some of the guests on a reservation, no cancellation fees will apply.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.guestSizeRule2: When cancelling only some of the guests on a reservation for 15 or more people, a cancellation fee will not be charged for up to 10% of the number of guests as of ten days before the check-in date (rounded up). In addition, when cancelling for only some guests for a booking with less than 15 guests, no cancellation fee will be charged. If the booking was made less than ten days before the check-in date, the number of guests will be calculated based on the number of guests on the date the reservation was completed.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.guestSizeRule3: When cancelling only some of the guests on a reservation, cancellation fees will apply for each cancelled guest, calculated as indicated above.
roomRateCategoryOverlay.guestSizeRule4: Please contact Customer Support to inquire about cancellation fees for cancelling only some of the guests on a reservation.

hotelDesc.overview:
Experience Luxury and Convenience at The Tower Hotel London

Situated in the heart of London, The Tower Hotel London offers a luxurious and convenient stay for both business and leisure travelers. With its prime location overlooking the iconic Tower Bridge and the River Thames, this 4-star hotel provides breathtaking views and easy access to some of London's most famous landmarks. Check-in at The Tower Hotel London begins at 3:00 PM, allowing guests to settle in and start their London adventure. The hotel's friendly and professional staff are always ready to assist with any inquiries or requests, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free check-in process. For those arriving early, the hotel provides secure luggage storage facilities, allowing guests to explore the city without any hindrance. With 801 elegantly designed rooms, The Tower Hotel London offers a variety of accommodation options to suit every traveler's needs. Each room is tastefully furnished with modern amenities, providing a comfortable and relaxing environment to unwind after a day of exploring the city. Whether you choose a Standard Room, Executive Room, or Suite, you can expect a spacious and well-appointed space, complete with all the necessary amenities for a pleasant stay. Families traveling with children will find The Tower Hotel London to be an ideal choice. The hotel's child policy allows children between the ages of 2 to 12 to stay free of charge, making it a budget-friendly option for families. The spacious rooms and convenient location near family-friendly attractions make it easy to explore London's wonders with your little ones. Built in 1973, The Tower Hotel London has established itself as a landmark in the city. Its timeless architecture and contemporary interiors create a unique blend of classic elegance and modern sophistication. Whether you are visiting London for business or leisure, this hotel provides an unforgettable experience, combining luxury, convenience, and stunning views of the city's iconic skyline.

Unwind and Enjoy at The Tower Hotel London's Entertainment Facilities

At The Tower Hotel London, you'll find a range of entertainment facilities that will make your stay in London truly memorable. Whether you're looking to relax with a drink, soak in the beautiful surroundings, or catch up on your favorite TV shows, this hotel has got you covered. Step into the hotel's stylish bar and experience a vibrant atmosphere where you can unwind with a refreshing cocktail or indulge in a glass of fine wine. With a wide selection of beverages and a cozy ambiance, it's the perfect place to socialize with friends or simply enjoy some quiet time. If you prefer the outdoors, The Tower Hotel London offers a stunning garden area where you can escape the hustle and bustle of the city. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of lush greenery and enjoy a peaceful moment amidst the beautiful surroundings. For those who enjoy a shared experience, the hotel also features a comfortable shared lounge/TV area. Catch up on your favorite shows, watch a movie, or engage in lively conversations with fellow guests. The lounge provides a relaxed and inviting space where you can connect with others and make lasting memories. No matter how you choose to unwind, The Tower Hotel London's entertainment facilities are designed to cater to all your needs. So sit back, relax, and let the hotel's exceptional amenities enhance your stay in the heart of London.

Stay Active at The Tower Hotel London's Sports Facilities

At The Tower Hotel London, staying active and maintaining your fitness routine is made easy with the hotel's exceptional sports facilities. Whether you are a fitness enthusiast or simply looking to stay in shape during your stay, you will find everything you need right at your fingertips. The hotel offers a state-of-the-art fitness center that is fully equipped with modern exercise equipment. From treadmills and elliptical machines to weightlifting stations and yoga mats, you will have access to a wide range of facilities to cater to your fitness needs. The fitness center is open 24/7, allowing you to work out at your convenience, whether it's early in the morning or late at night. In addition to the fitness center, The Tower Hotel London also provides complimentary access to a nearby fitness center. This gives guests the opportunity to enjoy even more options for staying active. Take advantage of the various fitness classes offered, such as spinning, pilates, or Zumba, and challenge yourself to reach new fitness goals. With these outstanding sports facilities, The Tower Hotel London ensures that guests can maintain their fitness routine and enjoy a healthy lifestyle during their stay. Whether you prefer to work out in a well-equipped fitness center or join a group fitness class, the hotel has you covered. Stay active and energized throughout your stay at The Tower Hotel London.

Convenience at Your Fingertips: The Tower Hotel London's Exceptional Facilities

Experience unparalleled convenience and comfort during your stay at The Tower Hotel London. With a wide range of exceptional facilities, this hotel ensures that every guest's needs are met with utmost care and efficiency. Start your day right with the hotel's 24-hour room service, allowing you to enjoy a delicious meal or refreshing beverage at any time. Leave your laundry worries behind with the convenient laundry service, ensuring that your clothes are fresh and clean throughout your stay. For added convenience, the hotel also offers express check-in/check-out, allowing you to save valuable time and make the most of your stay in London. Rest assured knowing that your valuables are secure with the safety deposit boxes provided. The dedicated concierge is always ready to assist you with any queries or travel arrangements, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience. Stay connected with Wi-Fi available in public areas and in all rooms, allowing you to easily stay in touch with loved ones or catch up on work. For those who prefer a designated smoking area, the hotel provides a comfortable space to indulge. Upgrade your stay with executive lounge access, where you can enjoy exclusive amenities and services. With daily housekeeping, your room will always be immaculate and inviting. Additionally, the hotel offers luggage storage and dry cleaning services, making it convenient for you to explore the city without any worries. The Tower Hotel London goes above and beyond to ensure that your stay is not only comfortable but also convenient. With an array of exceptional facilities and services, this hotel is the perfect choice for both business and leisure travelers seeking a hassle-free and enjoyable stay in the heart of London.

Convenient Transport Facilities at The Tower Hotel London

Located in the heart of London, The Tower Hotel offers a range of convenient transport facilities to ensure a seamless travel experience for its guests. Whether you're interested in visiting iconic landmarks like the Tower of London or exploring the vibrant neighborhoods of London, the ticket service at The Tower Hotel will help you plan your itinerary with ease. Additionally, the hotel provides a car park onsite, allowing guests to conveniently park their vehicles during their stay. Self-parking is available, and car park charges are applied. This is especially beneficial for guests who prefer to drive around the city or have their own transportation. For those who prefer not to drive, The Tower Hotel also offers a taxi service. Whether you need a ride to the airport or want to explore the city without the hassle of navigating public transportation, the hotel's taxi service ensures a comfortable and convenient journey. With its range of transport facilities, including a ticket service, onsite car park, and taxi service, The Tower Hotel London goes above and beyond to ensure that guests have easy access to explore the city and enjoy a stress-free stay.

Luxurious Amenities and Modern Comforts at The Tower Hotel London

Indulge in a world of luxury and modern comforts at The Tower Hotel London. Each room is thoughtfully designed to provide a relaxing and comfortable stay for every guest. Indulge in Culinary Delights at The Tower Hotel London

Discover the Vibrant Neighborhood of Tower Hamlets

Tower Hamlets is a bustling and diverse neighborhood located in the heart of London, United Kingdom. With its rich history and vibrant atmosphere, this area offers a unique blend of old-world charm and modern excitement. One of the main highlights of Tower Hamlets is its close proximity to iconic landmarks such as the Tower of London and Tower Bridge. History enthusiasts will be delighted to explore these historic sites and learn about the city's fascinating past. The neighborhood is also home to a thriving arts and cultural scene, with numerous art galleries, theaters, and music venues showcasing the talents of local artists. In addition to its cultural offerings, Tower Hamlets is known for its diverse culinary scene. From trendy cafes and gastropubs to international eateries and street food markets, there is something to satisfy every palate. Visitors can also enjoy leisurely strolls along the picturesque canals and green spaces, providing a peaceful escape from the bustling city. Whether you're a history buff, art lover, or food enthusiast, Tower Hamlets has something for everyone. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere and discover the unique charm of this London neighborhood.

Traveling to The Tower Hotel London from London's Airports

When it comes to reaching The Tower Hotel London from London's airports, travelers have several convenient options. The hotel is located in Tower Hamlets, London, making it easily accessible from major airports like Heathrow, Gatwick, and London City Airport. If you are arriving at Heathrow Airport, you can take the Heathrow Express train to Paddington Station, and then transfer to the Circle Line or Hammersmith & City Line to reach Tower Hill Station, which is just a short walk from the hotel. Alternatively, you can take a taxi or book a private transfer for a more direct journey. For those arriving at Gatwick Airport, the Gatwick Express train is a popular choice. This train will take you to Victoria Station, where you can then take the Circle Line or District Line to Tower Hill Station. Taxis and private transfers are also available for a hassle-free option. If you are flying into London City Airport, you're in luck as it is the closest airport to The Tower Hotel London. From the airport, you can take the DLR (Docklands Light Railway) to Tower Gateway Station, which is just a short walk away from the hotel. Taxis and private transfers are also readily available. No matter which airport you arrive at, reaching The Tower Hotel London is a breeze with the various transportation options available. From the moment you step off the plane, you'll be well on your way to experiencing the comfort and convenience of this exceptional hotel in the heart of London.

Discover the Vibrant Surroundings of The Tower Hotel London

Located in the heart of London, The Tower Hotel offers guests a prime location to explore the vibrant surroundings. Just a stone's throw away from the hotel, you'll find an array of landmarks and attractions that will leave you captivated. One of the nearby landmarks is Sheffield Square, a charming public square that offers a peaceful retreat from the bustling city. Take a leisurely stroll through the square, admire the beautiful architecture and enjoy a moment of tranquility in the heart of London. For art enthusiasts, the StolenSpace Gallery is a must-visit. This contemporary art gallery showcases a diverse range of urban and street art, providing a unique and thought-provoking experience. Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors and intricate details of the artworks on display. History buffs will appreciate the proximity of Wilton's Music Hall. This historic building, dating back to the 19th century, is the oldest surviving grand music hall in the world. Step inside and be transported back in time as you soak in the rich history and architectural beauty of this cultural gem. Additionally, the famous Tobacco Dock is just a short distance away. This Grade I listed warehouse complex offers a glimpse into London's maritime past. Explore the various shops, restaurants, and events that now occupy the space, and discover the unique blend of history and modernity. With its central location and proximity to these landmarks and attractions, The Tower Hotel is the perfect base for exploring all that London has to offer. Whether you're interested in history, art, or simply enjoying the vibrant atmosphere of the city, you'll find something to suit your taste within easy reach of the hotel.

Convenient Public Transport Stations near The Tower Hotel London

The Tower Hotel London is conveniently located near several public transport stations, making it easy for guests to explore the vibrant city of London. Just a short walk away is Whitechapel Tube Station, providing access to the District and Hammersmith & City lines. This allows guests to easily reach popular attractions such as the Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, and the British Museum. For those looking to venture further afield, Cambridge Heath Train Station and Wapping Railway Station are both within close proximity to the hotel. These stations offer connections to various parts of the country, allowing guests to easily explore other cities and towns in the United Kingdom. Additionally, the hotel is also near DLR - Langdon Park Metro Station, Bethnal Green Tube Station, Stepney Green Tube Station, Shoreditch High Street, Hackney Wick Train Station, DLR - Shadwell Metro Station, and Shadwell Railway Station. These stations provide convenient access to different parts of London, including popular areas like Shoreditch, Hackney, and Canary Wharf. With such a wide range of public transport options nearby, guests staying at The Tower Hotel London can effortlessly navigate the city and make the most of their visit to London.

A Culinary Adventure Awaits

Indulge in a culinary adventure just steps away from The Tower Hotel London. With an array of restaurants to choose from, you'll be spoilt for choice. Start your day with a hearty breakfast at Magus Coffee Shop, where you can enjoy freshly brewed coffee and delicious pastries. For lunch, head to BOXPARK Shoreditch, a trendy food and drink destination offering a variety of cuisines from around the world. In the evening, satisfy your cravings with a mouthwatering steak at Flat Iron or savor the flavors of authentic Indian cuisine at Tayyabs. If you're in the mood for some smoky barbecue delights, Smokestak is the place to be. For a unique dining experience, visit The Dickens Inn, a charming 18th-century pub serving classic British dishes. End your day on a high note with a refreshing craft beer at BrewDog Shoreditch. With so many options to choose from, your taste buds are in for a treat during your stay at The Tower Hotel London.

Shop 'til You Drop at The Tower Hotel London

Located in the heart of London, The Tower Hotel offers a prime location for shopping enthusiasts. Just a short distance from the hotel, you'll find a variety of shopping landmarks to explore. Start your retail therapy at Boxpark Shoreditch, a trendy pop-up mall filled with unique boutiques and street food vendors. For a taste of local culture, head to the Roman Road Market, where you can browse through stalls selling everything from fresh produce to vintage clothing. If you're a fan of all things vintage, make sure to visit Absolute Vintage, a hidden gem known for its impressive collection of retro footwear and accessories. Wine connoisseurs will appreciate a visit to Bottle Apostle, a boutique wine shop offering an extensive selection of carefully curated wines. Foodies shouldn't miss the Urban Food Fest, a vibrant street food market that takes place every Saturday night, offering a wide range of international cuisines to satisfy any craving. For a picturesque stroll, make your way to St. Katharine Docks, a charming marina surrounded by a variety of shops, bars, and restaurants. If you're looking for unique gifts or home decor, Colombia Road Shops & Flower Market is the place to be, with its charming boutiques and vibrant flower stalls. Art enthusiasts can explore the Howard Griffin Gallery, which showcases contemporary artwork from emerging artists, or visit The Graffiti Life Gallery, where you can admire stunning street art pieces. And for those who love all things handmade, Urbiana UK offers a curated selection of beautifully crafted items made by local artisans. With such a diverse range of shopping landmarks nearby, The Tower Hotel London is the perfect choice for those who want to indulge in some retail therapy during their stay in London.

Affordable Luxury at The Tower Hotel London

Experience the perfect blend of luxury and affordability at The Tower Hotel London. With an average price of $265 per room, this stunning hotel offers exceptional value for money compared to the average price of a hotel room in London, which is $260. Step into a world of elegance and comfort as you enter The Tower Hotel London. From the moment you arrive, you will be captivated by the stylish decor and impeccable service. Each room is tastefully designed with modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable stay. Whether you are traveling for business or pleasure, The Tower Hotel London provides the perfect sanctuary in the heart of the city. Not only does The Tower Hotel London offer exceptional value for money, but it also boasts a prime location. Situated on the banks of the River Thames, this hotel offers breathtaking views of iconic landmarks such as the Tower Bridge and the Tower of London. With easy access to public transportation, you can explore all that London has to offer with ease. Indulge in a world-class dining experience at one of the hotel's restaurants, where you can savor delectable cuisine prepared by renowned chefs. After a long day of sightseeing or meetings, unwind at the hotel's fitness center or take a leisurely stroll along the riverbank. With its affordable luxury and unbeatable location, The Tower Hotel London is the perfect choice for travelers seeking a memorable stay in London. Book your room now and experience the best of this vibrant city without breaking the bank.

Excellent Experience at The Tower Hotel London

The Tower Hotel London has received rave reviews from its satisfied customers. With its beautiful location and lovely interior, guests are treated to a truly memorable stay. With an impressive overall rating of 8.2, this hotel has proven to provide exceptional value for money, ensuring guests feel satisfied with their investment. Another area where this hotel shines is its cleanliness, which has been rated at an impressive 8.3.
